shared.noData: An error has occurred. Please try again in a few seconds, check again later or take a look at our status page for updates.
shared.noResults: Apologier. We couldn't find any hits with the selected filter(s).
shared.area_noAreaMessage: You must select a county or municipality. Please, use the filters above to select an area.

frontpage.title: Translation demo
frontpage.frontpage_introText1: Join in! Report species you have seen
frontpage.frontpage_introText2: Learn more about how you can contribute
frontpage.frontpage_introText3: Want to help us ensure the quality of our sightings' data?

about.intro: Below you can find information on the Norwegian Species Observations System and how to contact us with questions.

press.intro_news: This page presents news related to the Species Observations System. Other news articles from the Norwegian Biodiversity Information Centre may also be listed, if it is relevant for this system. Most (or all) of the information will be in Norwegian.

statistics.intro_validatedData: A number of observations are quality checked by validators. Both the species identification, time and locality, as well as the provided documentation, are checked. Red-listed species, alien species and other species important for nature management, are prioritized for validation. Read more about data validation under 'About'.
statistics.outro_alienSpecies: Are you interested in knowing more about impact assessments on alien species in Norway? See information on alien species and search our Alien Species List from 2018.
statistics.outro_redlistedSpecies: Are you interested in knowing more about our Red List assessments? See our information and results from 2015.
statistics.usersCount_dataDescription: By users we mean users that have registered sightings in the last year, this year or in the last 7 days.
statistics.overviewStats_heading_2: Image count per species group and images count per species group with open license
statistics.overviewStats_heading_3: Sightings count from Artsobservasjoner.no and findings in Artskart per year since 2007
statistics.overviewStats_heading_4: Number of registered users in Artsobservasjoner.no
statistics.description_content: The following table shows number of observations of {{ value }} by species group in each of the categories below.
statistics.description_includedData: Categories without observations are omitted from the table.
statistics.description_includedDataExplanation: A description of the data included may be found at [xxxxx]. Statistics are updated daily.
statistics.description_excluded: * Includes all validation categories except 'not validated (sighting not validated).'
statistics.description_approved: ** Has one of the following validation category:
statistics.description_overviewStats: The following tables show diverse data from Artsobservasjoner. Use the dropdown below to select which data set you would like to see.
statistics.description_validatedData: The table(s) show(s) the number of sighted taxa and the sightings count per species group.
statistics.description_sightingCountArtsobsVsArtska: The graph shows the number of sightings in Artsobservasjoner compared with the number of finds in Artskart. Artskart collects localized information about species in Norway from all data sources, including Artsobservasjoner.
statistics.description_imageCountPerSpeciesGroup:
The table shows the number of images per species group and the number of images per species group where the image has an open license. An open license is one of the following Creative Commons licenses:
  • CC BY 4.0 - Attribution
  • CC BY-SA - Creative Commons Attribution-ShareAlike
  • CC BY-NC-SA - Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share-alike

The alternative to the three open licenses is All rights reserved .
statistics.description_sightsByRegisterType: The table shows the number of users who have registered sightings via the various registration methods, web form, Excelimport, the mobile app, Sabimas Artsjakten app and projects. The table also shows the number of sightings registered per registration method
statistics.description_monthlySightings: The table shows the number of sightings made each month per species group. Note that it is regardless of when the observation was registered (for example, you can observe a species in March, but you registered the observation two months later). For a more detailed overview of a species group, please go to the search page.

tables.tableCaption_countySpeciesData: Number of species sighted by county over the years
tables.tableCaption_municipalitySpeciesData: Number of species sighted by municipality over the years
tables.tableCaption_validatedData: Number of validated observations per species group
tables.tableCaption_validatedDataOriginal: Number of taxa observed and number of observations per species group
tables.tableCaption_validatedData2: Validated sightings count by validation category
tables.tableCaption_redlistedSpeciesData: Number of sightings of endangered species by species group
tables.tableCaption_alienSpeciesData: Number of sightings of alien species by species group
tables.tableCaption_geographicalDistribution: Sightings count per species group per area (county)
tables.tableHeading_percentArtsobsInArtskart:
Percent of data from Artsobservasjoner
in Artskart
tables.tableFootnote_totalSightinsDifference: The total shows fewer sightings than other statistics because of some sightings might not have a user attached to them
tables.tableFootnote_percentByRegisterType: How many of all sightings are registered this way
tables.tableFootnote_nullFindings: The species individual is been search for but not found
